response.overview: 2009 AVN Award Nominee for Best Transsexual ReleaseThailand is a very HOT place in more than one sense of the word. From the sticky, balmy climate to the spicy hot noodles and curry. From police crackdowns to the sweaty go-go bars of Pattaya. And last, but certainly not least, are the Smokin' HOT and very elusive Ladyboys that troll the city streets at night. Brand New Ladyboys will steam up your shorts even more than a bowl of Tom Yum soup. This volume is destined to be the hottest Little Asian Transsexuals yet.
response.title: Little Asian Transsexuals 11
